document_data.name: Powder horn
document_data.mainbody: '''Powder horns''' were a type of small portable vessel used to store and transport either [[gunpowder]]<ref name ="drag321-p38">{{Cite dragon/321/The Way of the Gun|38}} or [[smokepowder]].
document_data.Description:
[[File:Drowgunslinger.png|thumb|220px|A member of the [[Bregan D'aerthe]] walks with a powder horn strapped to their waist.]]
Powder horns typically took the form of a shoulder-strung horn or leather flask,<ref name ="drag321-p38" /> typically waterproof.

Notable Users.Races & Sentient Creatures: * [[Rock gnome]]s could often be found carrying powder horns for use with [[pistol]]s.
Notable Users.Regions & Settlements:
* The people of [[Lantan]] often had powder horns for use with their firearms.
* Powder horns could sometimes be found in use by those with firearms in the [[Nelanther Isles]].

document_data.Trivia: Gunpowder and smokepowder were typically sold within either powder horns or [[powderkeg]]s.
